most_active_tickets.title: it doesnt stop selecting, it seems like "shift" or "mouse 1" is locked
Auto Generated Context Always returns to Medium

common_issues.title: Pieces OS: Unexpected selection behavior and auto-generated context reset
common_issues.description: Users reported persistent selection issues, possibly due to stuck "shift" or "mouse 1" keys, primarily on Windows. Additionally, the auto-generated context setting for saved material enrichment frequently resets to "Medium" on macOS, despite user changes.  Further investigation is needed to identify the root cause and solutions for both issues.

related_issues.title: it doesnt stop selecting, it seems like "shift" or "mouse 1" is locked
related_issues.text:
it doesnt stop selecting, it seems like "shift" or "mouse 1" is locked
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.3.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I'm not sure how to make it happen but its **extremely** annoying, it seems like it thinks I'm holding "shift" or "mouse 1", i use the arrow keys a lot but when this bug is active it selects instead of moving, when i try to click when its active it also selects, i cant ctrl + v when its active :(

related_issues.title: Auto Generated Context Always returns to Medium
related_issues.text:
Auto Generated Context Always returns to Medium
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

Platform MacOS Version 15.5 (Build 24F74)

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Hello!

This is an issue that I've seen happen in all of the builds since I've started using pieces. When changing the Auto-Generated Context (Saved Material Enrichment) option in Machine Learning from the menu, in my case I want it to be "High", but every time I change it, when I check the next day or any time later, or every time the app or os updates, the option selected goes back to "Medium". So I don't actually even know if it ever used "High", because it always returns the option to "Medium".
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and address the persistent selection issue on Windows (possibly related to stuck 'shift' or 'mouse 1' keys).
Fix the auto-generated context setting for saved material enrichment on macOS to retain user-selected values.
Prioritize resolving issue #803 due to its high activity level.
